entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
